column1: aTa yuktizazwi kArikA nAma maQju Sri kumAra ButAya namaH
column2: @20b * // rgya gar skad du /yugti shashtha k'a k'a ri k'a n'a ma / bod skad du / rigs pa drug cu pa'i tshig le 'ur byas pa zhes bya ba / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // gang gi skye dang 'jig pa dag / tshul 'di yis ni spangs gyur pa //

column1: namaH tasmE muni indrAya pratItya upAda deSine yena anenAH viDAnena nizidDO= udaya vyayO
column2: rten cing 'byung ba gsungs pa yi // thub dbang de la phyag 'tshal lo // gang gis blo gros yod med las //

column1: BAva aBAva vyatikrAntA matiH yezAm anASritA
column2: rnam par 'das shing mi gnas pa //

column1: tEH gamBIraH niralambaH pratyaya arTaH pratIyate  yukti
column2: de dag gis ni rkyen gyi don // zab mo dmigs med rnam par rtogs //

column1: sarva doza AkaraH tAvat aBAvaH vinivAritaH
column2: re zhig nyes kun 'byung ba'i gnas // med nyid rnam par bzlog zin gyis //

column1: nirvartyate yaTA yuktayA BAvaH pi SrvavaNam kuru  yukti
column2: rigs pa'i gang gis yod nyid dang // bzlog par 'gyur ba mnyan par gyis //

column1: BAvaH yadi Bavet sati yaTA bAlEH vikalpitaH
column2: ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags bzhin // dngos po gal te bden 'gyur na // de dngos med pas rnam thar du //

column1: vimokzaH tad aBAvena kaH na icCet kim na kArnAt  yukti
column2: gang gis mi 'dod rgyu ci zhig /

column1: vimokzaH na asti BAvena BAvaH na asti hi aBAvataH
column2: yod pas rnam par mi grol te // med pas srid pa 'di las min /

column1: BAva aBAva parijQAnAt mahAtmA pi vimucyate  yukti
column2: dngos dang dngos med yongs shes pas // bdag nyid chen po rnam par grol //

column1: nirvANam ca eva lokam ca manyante tattva darSinaH
column2: de nyid ma mthong 'jig rten dang // mya ngan 'das par rlom sems te //

column1: na eva lokam na nirvAnam manyante tattva darSinaH  yukti
column2: de nyid gzigs rnams 'jig rten dang // mya ngan 'das par rlom sems med //

column1: nirvAnam ca BavaH ca eva dvayam eva na vidyate
column2: srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das // gnyis po 'di ni yod ma yin //

column1: parijQAnam Bavasya eva nirvANam iti kaTyate  yukti
column2: srid pa yongs su shes pa nyid // mya ngan 'das shes bya bar brjod //

column1: samBava viBave BAve niroDaH kalpitaH yaTA
column2: dngos po byung ba zhig pa la // ji ltar 'gog par brtags pa bzhin //

column1: mAyA kRtaH niroDaH yam sadBiH taTA evam izyate  yukti
column2: de bzhin dam pa rnams kyis kyang // sgyu ma byas lta'i 'gog pa bzhed //

column1: samskRtaH na parijQAtaH niroDaH viBave sati
column2: rnam par 'jig pas 'gog 'gyur gyi // 'dus byas yongs su shes pas min //

column1: pratyakzam BUyate kasmin viBavaH jQAyate kaTam  yukti
column2: de ni su la mngon sum 'gyur // zhig shes pa der ji ltar 'gyur //

column1: yadi skanDa niroDena Bavet na kleSa samkzayaH
column2: gal te phung po ma 'gags na // nyon mongs zad kyang 'das mi 'gyur //

column1: yadA ca ayam nirudDaH syAt tadA mokzaH Bavisyati  yukti
column2: gang tshe 'dir ni 'gags gyur pa // de yi tshe na grol bar 'gyur //

column1: avidyA pratyaya utpannam samyak jQAnena paSyataH
column2: ma rig rkyen gyis byung ba la // yang dag ye shes kyis gzigs nas //

column1: na utpAdaH ca niroDaH ca yuktaH kaH pyupalaByate
column2: skye ba dang ni 'gags pa'ang rung // 'ga' yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //

column1: evam paSyati DarmaH yaH nirvAnam vA katam taTA
column2: de nyid mthong chos mya ngan 'das // 'das shing bya ba byas pa'ang yin // gal te chos shes mjug thogs su //

column1: Darma jQAnam param yatra BedaH tu tatra vidyate
column2: 'di la bye brag yod na ni //

column1: ati sukzmasya BAvasya jAtiH yena vikalpitA
column2: dngos po shin tu phra ba la'ang // gang @21a * // gis skye bar rnam brtags pa //

column1: pratyaya udBavam arTam na paSyati saH vicakzaNaH

column2: nyon mongs zad pa'i dge slong gi / gal te 'khor ba rnam ldog na //

column1: kutas sampanna budDEH ca tasya AramBaH na BAzitaH

column1: AramBe sati ca ekAnte Bavet Rzwi parigraH

column1: yaH pratItyasamutpAdaH tasya purvam param vA kim

column1: samutpannam kaTam purvam paScAt punar nivAryate
column2: sngon skye ba ni ji ltar na // phyi nas slar yang bzlog par 'gyur // sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' bral ba //

column1: purva aparAnta vihInaH mokzaH KyAtiH mAyA upamaH
column2: 'gro ba sgyu ma bzhin du snang //

column1: Bavati idam yadA mAyA namkzyati iti tadA eva hi
column2: gang tshe sgyu ma 'byung zhe'am // gang tshe 'jig par 'gyur snyam du // sgyu ma shes pa der mi rmongs //

column1: mAyA jQAna parABUtaH mAyA jQAnena mohitaH
column2: sgyu ma mi shes yongs su sred //

column1: purva antam vA aparAntam vA na dRzwayA parikliSyate

column1: samskRtam ye hi manyante Banga utpAda vikalpitam
column2: skye dang 'jig pa rnam brtags pa //

column1: pratItya utpAda cakreNa vijAnanti na te jagat
column2: de dag rten 'byung 'khor lo yis // 'khor lo'i 'gro ba rnam mi rtog /

column1: tat ASritya yat utpannam na utpannam svayam eva hi
column2: de dang de brten gang 'byung de // rang gi dngos por skyes ma yin //

column1: svayam yadA yat utpannam utpannam nAma tat kaTam

column1: SAntam hetu kzayAt eva kzINam nAma avabuDyate

column1: svaBAvena hi yat kzINam tat kzINam ucyate kaTam

column1: na kaScid anutpannam niroDaH pi na vE taTA

column1: utpAda Banga karmaNA aBiprAya arTaH pradarSitaH

column1: anitya tva avaboDAt ca sadDarmaH hi viboDitaH
